get_workout.description: Retrieve a specific completed workout session by its ID. Use this only for fetching existing workout records, not for planning.

workout_id.description: Unique identifier of the workout to retrieve

list_workouts.description: Retrieve a list of previously completed or planned workout sessions. Use this for viewing workout history, not for creating training plans.

pageSize.description: Number of workouts per page (default 5, max 10)

list_routines.description: Retrieve a list of workout routines (workout templates/plans). Use this to view existing training programs.

pageSize.description: Number of routines per page (default 5, max 10)

create_routine.description: Create a new workout routine template or plan. THIS IS THE CORRECT TOOL TO USE when a user asks for a workout plan, program, or routine. Creates a reusable workout template not tied to specific dates.

title.description: Title of the routine/plan (e.g., "Full Body 3x Week", "Push/Pull/Legs Split")

notes.description: Detailed description of the routine including goals, frequency, and other relevant information

exercises.description: List of exercises to include in the routine with recommended sets, reps and weights

superset_id.description: ID for grouping exercises into supersets (null if not part of a superset)

rest_seconds.description: Rest time in seconds between sets

sets.description: Array of sets for this exercise

type.description: Type of set (e.g., normal, warmup, dropset)

distance_meters.description: Distance in meters for cardio exercises

update_routine.description: Update an existing workout routine template. Use this to modify an existing training plan.

routine_id.description: Unique identifier of the routine to update

description.description: Updated detailed description of the routine

exercises.description: Updated list of exercises with recommended sets, reps and weights

delete_routine.description: Delete an existing workout routine template

routine_id.description: Unique identifier of the routine to delete

list_exercise_templates.description: Retrieve a list of exercise templates from the Hevy database. Use this to find available exercises when creating workout routines.

pageSize.description: Number of templates per page (default 20, max 100)

get_exercise_template.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific exercise template by its ID. Use this to get information about an exercise when creating workout routines.

exercise_template_id.description: Unique identifier of the exercise template
